resources.string: This application reads and writes data from/to a MIFARE Ultralight EV1 NFC tag.

There are 5 icons to click on:
1 home = this page
2 read data with or without authentication
3 write counter = increment the counter
4 write data
5 write configuration = changes the configuration of the tag (e.g. authentication key, write and/or read authentication, memory clearing, change password)
This app works with a MIFARE Ultralight EV1 tag for reading
This example expects a MIFARE Ultralight type tag.\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from all records will be read.
This example reads an Ultralight EV1 tag type and shows the value of the counter(s).\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from all records will be read.
This app works with a MIFARE Ultralight EV1 tag for writing
This example writes data to a page on a MIFARE Ultralight C tag
Increment the value of the counter

This example increases the counter on an Ultralight EV1 tag type and shows the value of the counter.\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the counter will be increased without any further confirmation (if selected).
The increasing of a counter is not reversible and not resettable, so please act with caution
Memory Protection: Select the page from where an authentication is required for writing or reading. Using \'48\' disables memory protection.
Select if the memory protection is for write access only or write & read access
This example expects a MIFARE Ultralight EV1 type tag. It writes a new memory protection configuration to the tag.\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the new data will be written without any confirmation.
Change the password of the tag, select the new Default or a Custom password
Select if the user memory should get cleared or not
